mapper.insert: INSERT INTO appointment (user_id, visit_date, visit_reason, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{visitDate}, #{visitReason}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE appointment SET user_id = #{userId}, visit_date = #{visitDate}, visit_reason = #{visitReason}, status = #{status}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE appointment_id = #{appointmentId}
mapper.select: SELECT appointment_id, user_id, visit_date, visit_reason, status, create_time, update_time FROM appointment WHERE appointment_id = #{appointmentId}
SELECT appointment_id, user_id, visit_date, visit_reason, status, create_time, update_time FROM appointment WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
